services.title: Finally, Someone Who Gets It
services.text: You're amazing at what you do. But the tech, the English, the agencies that overpromise. None of that was part of the plan. We built ThaiSpaPro for people exactly like you.

items.title: The Tech Becomes Invisible
items.text: You trained for years to heal people with your hands. Not to wrestle with websites, fight with software, or decode error messages at midnight. We take all of that off your plate. Permanently. You'll forget there's even a technical side to your business.

items.title: Agencies Are Built for Big Budgets. We're Built for You.
items.text: You've seen the quotes. Thousands upfront, then more for changes, more for support. It adds up fast for businesses like yours. We built this differently. One price covers everything. No projects, no surprises, no extra bills.

items.title: Thai When You Need It. English When They Need It.
items.text: Talk to us the way you think. In Thai, about the things that mean something to your business. Your customers see perfect English. Professional. Polished. Trustworthy. You get both worlds without the stress of either.

services2.title: Five services, one monthly fee.
services2.text: We set them all up, keep them running, and they all talk to each other.

items.title: Your Website
items.text: A professional website designed specifically for Thai massage. Fast, mobile-friendly, and built to rank when someone nearby searches for your services. It'll look like your business, feel like your business, and actually bring people through the door.

items.title: AI Receptionist
items.text: AI answers your calls and messages in perfect English, any time of day or night. If you've ever lost a booking because you couldn't get to the phone during a treatment, this fixes that. Every enquiry handled, every time.

items.title: Booking System
items.text: Customers see your availability online and book themselves in. They get a confirmation, you get a notification, and the system sends reminders automatically. Your calendar fills up without the back-and-forth.

items.title: Gift Vouchers
items.text: Customers purchase vouchers directly from your website, any time. Delivery is instant, and the system tracks codes, expiry dates, and redemptions automatically. No spreadsheets, no paper trails.

items.title: Review Collection
items.text: After each appointment, the system sends a friendly review request on your behalf. Happy clients get directed to Google. Unhappy ones send feedback to you privately first, giving you a chance to respond before anything goes public.

services2.bottomHeading: We Handle Setup. Training. Support. Everything.
services2.bottomText: We build it all for you. We show you how it works. We answer questions in Thai or English whenever you have them. Updates, fixes, improvements. All part of the service, forever.

whoWeAre.header: We set up Thai massage businesses online and keep everything running. No tech headaches, no agency nonsense, and definitely no surprises on your bill.
whoWeAre.title: Started By Someone Who's Been in Your Shoes
whoWeAre.text: I'm Kris. Originally from Thailand, now living in the UK.
whoWeAre.text2: Most Thai massage businesses I know are run by brilliant therapists who hate dealing with websites, bookings, and tech. They've either paid agencies that didn't deliver, or tried doing it themselves and gave up.
whoWeAre.text3: That's why Andrew and I started ThaiSpaPro. We take care of your whole online setup. Website, bookings, reviews, vouchers, and phone answering. Everything's connected, everything's managed, and you can talk to us in Thai whenever you need.
whoWeAre.text4: You keep doing great work. We keep everything else running.

items.text: Kris takes care of everything for me and explains it all in Thai so I really understand. I used to be so worried about the technology, but now I feel confident. It is a big relief to have her help.
items.name: May
items.title: Owner, Sri-Chan Thai Massage, UK

items.text: Kris really understood my experience and built a beautiful site that shows my work properly. I am so happy with how professional everything looks now. It feels great to have a team that truly supports my business.
